thread.title: Lisa Howington
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Lisa Howington

author: Lisa Howington
title: Lisa Howington
text: Tom H my salesman couldn't have been nicer and the delivery guys were fantastic. The GW system is too much slow paperwork. Need to upgrade to tablets and computer systems. I could have ordered this online in 1/20th the time it took in store.
